summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The Ad Hoc Judicial Nominating Committee of the City Council of Dallas will convene on June 25, 2024, at 1:30 PM. The meeting will be held in the Council Chambers on the 6th floor of City Hall and will also be accessible via videoconference. The primary purpose is to discuss and make recommendations regarding the appointment of full-time Municipal Judges and Associate Judges.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
1. Approval of the minutes from the June 4, 2024 meeting.
2. Executive session to deliberate on the potential appointment and employment of judges.
3. Consideration of recommendations from the Judicial Nominating Commission for the selection of judges.

**Important Details**:  
The committee will review the recommendations for the positions of full-time Municipal Judge and Associate Judge. This includes deliberation on candidates' qualifications and suitability for the roles. The meeting will also include an executive session, as permitted under the Texas Open Meetings Act, to discuss sensitive personnel matters.

**Action Items**:  
The committee is seeking approval for the minutes from the previous meeting and will make decisions based on the Judicial Nominating Commission's recommendations for the judicial positions. The outcome of these discussions will influence the appointment of judges within the municipal court system.
